Literature.Title: Design of a novel membrane-destabilizing peptide selectively acting on acidic liposomes.
Literature.Author: Machida S, Niimi S, Shi X, Ando Y, Yu Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=3.1µM),Bacillus subtilis IFO 13722(MIC=6.3µM),Bacillus cereus IFO 3457(MIC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209P JC-1(MIC=1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus IFO 13276(MIC=25µM),Staphylococcus aureus JCM 2431(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus Smith(MIC=6.3µM),Escherichia coli NIHJ JC-2(MIC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 39188(MIC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli JCM 1649(MIC=6.3µM),Escherichia coli CR3(MIC=6.3µM),Escherichia coli CE273(MIC=3.1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 1891(MIC=6.3µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=6.3µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus IFO12711(MIC=>50µM)
